ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectOrder Declining to Set Aside or Refer Back to the CRTC Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2019-431
PrecisOrder declining to set aside or refer back to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) for reconsideration and hearing the decision contained in Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2019-431 of December 19, 2019 to renew the broadcasting licence for the national satellite subscription radio undertakings SIRIUS CANADA and XM CANADA.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2020-0031 Publication Date: 2020-04-01
